post.file: Host * CheckHostIP no ForwardX11 yes ForwardAgent yes StrictHostKeyChecking no UsePrivilegedPort no Protocol 2,1 HostbasedAuthentication yes EnableSSHKeySign yes

kickstart.post:
chmod a+rx /root mkdir /root/.ssh chmod a+rx /root/.ssh
sed -i -e 's/#PermitUserEnvironment no/PermitUserEnvironment yes/' \ /etc/ssh/sshd_config
# Enable HostbasedAuthentication sed -ri -e "/^#?HostbasedAuthentication/ c HostbasedAuthentication yes" /etc/ssh/sshd_config

mkdir -p /.ssh chmod a+rx /.ssh
Match User root HostbasedAuthentication no
sed -e '/PermitRootLogin/s/no/yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config > /tmp/sshd_config
